63928.「……そいつが お前の元相棒 キッズか。\n ようやく バトルマスターになる\n:
So that's your former partner, Fry. I see
you've finally decided to become a
battlemaster. Fabel.

63929.「これから先 剣の修行は 過酷になる。\n まもの使いに未練を残したまま\n 生:
From now on, sword training will be severe. I don't want you to continue with a half-hearted attitude while you have unfinished business
with a Monster Master.

63930.「こいつは オレが 野に帰しといてやる。\n さあ キッズを こっちによこしな！:
I'll send him back to the field. Come on, Fry,
let's go!

63931.「なぜ そこまで キッズに固執する？\n こいつは 父親を襲った魔物なんだろ？:
Why are you so obsessed with Fry? He's the
monster that attacked your father, isn't he?

63933.「……わかったよ。オレ 覚悟を決める。: All right. I'll make up my mind.

63934.「でも キッズは オレの手で 野に帰すよ。\n そこまでしないと 未練なんか\n:
But I'm going to let Fry go back to the field.
If I don't do that, I don't think I'll be able
to cut off any lingering feelings.

63935.「やめときな。自分で 手放そうとすると\n 情に ほだされて せっかくの決心が…:
Don't do it. If you try to let go, you'll fall
prey to your emotions.

63936.「……仕方がない。お前の好きにしろ。: ...I don't have a choice. Do what you want.

63937.「そんな所で 何してるのさ？\n また 母さんに 何か頼まれたのか？:
What are you doing out here? Did Mom ask you
to do something for me again?

63938.「……ふぅん。まもの使い宛てに来た 仕事の話を\n レンドアの町長の所へ 聞きに:
Hmm. I'm going to ask the mayor of Lendor
about a job that was sent to me by a Monster
Master... Is that how it's supposed to be?

63940.「よし。オレも その仕事に付き合うよ。: All right. I'll go along with the job.

63941.「まもの使いの仕事を 目に焼き付けて……\n それで 決めたいんだ。:
I want to see the work of a Monster Master
with my own eyes... and then I'll make up my
mind.

63942.「アンタの後ろから 適当に ついていくし。\n オレのことは 気にしないで\n:
I'll just follow along behind you. Don't worry
about me, just go to your destination.

63943.「じゃ。よろしくな。: Well then. Nice to meet you.

63944.「どうだい <pc>さん？\n 怪しい鳥の魔物は 見つかった？:
How's it going, <pc>? Did you find
the weird bird monster?

63945.「へへ。オレも シガールのオッサンから\n 話を聞きだして 駆けつけたんだ。\n:
Heh. I heard from Sigal's old man, too, and
came running. But from the looks of it, it
looks like he's not ready yet.

63946.「それじゃ 鳥魔物が現れるかどうか\n ここで しばらく 様子を見るとするか。:
Well then, let's wait here for a while to see
if the bird monster will appear.

63947.「……オレ デイラーさんに言われたんだ。\n バトルマスターになるためには\n:
Dailer told me that in order to become a
battlemaster, I have to break off my
attachment to being a Monster Master.

63948.「そのためには キッズを 野に帰せって……。\n だから 最後に まもの使いのア:
To do that, he wanted me to return Fry to the field... So I wanted to travel with you, the Monster Master, one last time to see what was
in my heart.

63949.「本当に まもの使いを あきらめて\n このまま バトルマスターになっていいのか:
Can I really give up on being a Monster Master
and become a battle master like this? Or...

63952.「怪しい鳥魔物って アイツだよな……。\n 確かに あんな色の ひくいどり\n:
That's the weird bird monster, isn't it...
I've certainly never seen a Firebird of that
color before.

63953.「後を追ってみようぜ <pc>さん！\n ヤツが飛んでった 北東の方角には\n:
Let's go after him. There's supposed to be a
hole in the ground to the northeast of where
he flew over, called Nagiri Cave!

63954.「オレたちは 先に ナギリ洞に行ってるぜ！\n いいか？ ナギリ洞だぞ 忘れんな:
We're going to Nagiri Cave first! Okay? Don't
forget Nagiri Cave!

63956.「……商品ナンバー１３も だいぶ\n オレたちの言うことを 聞くようになったな。:
...Item Number 13 is starting to listen to us
a lot more now.

63957.「ブヒヒ。ここまで長かったもんね。\n レンドア島に 行って帰ってを\n 何回:
Boo-hoo. It's been a long time since we got
here. I can't tell you how many times I've had
to go to Lendor Island and back.

63958.「だが その甲斐あって 商品ナンバー１３は\n 切り込み部隊として 使えるまでに:
But it all paid off, as Item Number 13 became
a useful incision unit...

63959.「さあて いよいよだ。 \n 後は おかしらが 最強の兵器となる獲物を\n 手に:
Now it's time. All that's left to do is to
execute when Okasara receives the most
powerful weapon of them all.

63960.「オレたち 魔物商人の未来を決める\n レンドア島壊滅作戦をな……！:
The future of the monster merchants depends on
the destruction of Lendor Island.

63964.「ブヒヒ。なんだ こいつら？\n まあ あの作戦のこと 聞かれちゃったからには\:
Boo-hoo. What's with these guys? Well, now
that they've asked about the mission, we can't
let them leave alive, can we?

63965.「そうだな。こいつらには 商品ナンバー１３の\n 実戦訓練の相手にでも なっても:
I guess so. I'll have them train with Item
Number 13. Let's go, Charman!

63967.「ブヒヒ。取り逃がしたかと思ったら\n のこのこ そっちから来てくれるなんて\n:
Boo-hee. I'm so grateful that you're coming
over here just when I thought I'd missed it.

63968.「レンドア島壊滅作戦のことを 知られた以上\n 生かしておくわけには いかねえ。:
Now that they know about our mission to
destroy Lendor Island, we can't let them live.
Come on, Charman!

63970.「クソッ！ なにもんだ てめえ……。\n 魔物を操って 戦うのは\n オレら魔物:
Damn it! Who the hell do you think you are...
controlling and fighting monsters is the
exclusive domain of us monster merchants...

63973.「デイラー……さん……？\n どういうこと……？: Mr. Dailer...? What do you mean...?

63974.「悪いが そういうことでね。\n 旅のバトルマスターなんて デタラメ……。\n:
I'm sorry, but that's what happened. The
traveling battlemasters are a bunch of hogwash
and I'm the master of them all.

63975.「オレが お前に近づいた目的は ただひとつ。\n そこにいる キッズを\n お前:
I approached you for one reason only. It was
to take the Fry away from you.

63976.「そんな……。それで <cs_pchero>さんや\n オレの後を つけてきて: So you followed <cs_pchero> and me here...

63977.「ふふ。お前んちの ばあさんは\n 一流の まもの使いだったらしいじゃねえか。\:
Hmmm. I heard that your grandmother was a
first-rate Monster Master. I can't mess with
someone like that.

63978.「だから お前のトラウマを利用して\n 平和的に キッズを手放してもらおうと\n:
That's why he was using your trauma to get you
to let go of Fry peacefully.

63979.「まあ 途中から ばあさん以外にも\n ジャマなヤツが現れたがな。:
Well, there were some other people besides
Granny who showed up along the way.

63980.「さてと…… それじゃ ファーベル。\n いい子だから キッズを オレに渡しな。:
All right, well, Fabel. You're a good boy, so
give Fry to me.

63981.「きたねえ……。\n 誰が お前なんかに キッズを渡すもんか！:
You're a creep... who's going to give Fry to
you?

63982.「キッズ！ こんなヤツ\n お前の炎で 丸コゲにしてやれ！:
Fry! I want you to burn him to a crisp with
your flames!

63987.「キッズ……。どうしたんだよ？\n これじゃ まるで あの時と……\n 父さんを:
Fry... what's wrong with you? This is just
like that time... when you attacked my dad.

63989.「ククク…… そうだ。\n あの時 キッズを狂わせたのは このオレさ。:
Kukuku... Yes, that's right. It was me who
drove Fry crazy that time.

63990.「チャーマン！ トレダ！\n そのドラゴンキッズを捕まえて 眠らせておけ！:
Charman! Tred! Get that Small Fry and put him
to sleep!

63993.「こいつは 魔物と まもの使いの絆を断ち切り\n 野生に戻す粉。こうでもしないと:
This is a powder that breaks the bond between monster and Monster Master and returns them to the wild. If we don't do this, they won't
listen to us after we catch them.

63994.「あの時も……お前らが来るのを 待ち伏せして\n この粉をまいたんだ。お前の親父:
That time too... we ambushed you and your friends when you were coming and sprinkled this powder on you. Your father was the first
to see what was going on.

63995.「しかし お前の親父も アレだよな。\n オレに気づいて 追ってこなけりゃ\n:
But your father is like that too. He wouldn't
have been killed if he hadn't noticed me and
didn't come after me.

63997.「おかげで こいつを手に入れるのに\n ずいぶんと 苦労したぜ。: I had to work very hard to receive this guy.

63998.「この 絶滅寸前の超希少種……\n ゴールデンキングリザードの子供をな……。:
This nearly extinct and extremely rare
species... the Golden King Lizard...

63999.「じゃあな ファーベル。\n お前のかわいいキッズが レンドア島を\n 海に沈め:
So long, Fabel. Look forward to the day your
little Fry sinks Lendor Island in the sea!

64001.「シガールのオッサンには オレが伝えとくよ。\n このままじゃ レンドアが危ない: I'll tell Sigal's old man. Lendor's in danger.

64002.「<cs_pchero>さんは 先に\n 母さんのとこに 帰っててくれ。\n 後:
<cs_pchero> go home to your mother first.
I'll be there later.

64003.「ファーベル……。どうしたの あなた？\n そんな所に突っ立って。\n キッズは:
Fabel... what's the matter, honey? You're just
standing there. Where is Fry? Wasn't he with
you?

64004.「母さん ばあちゃん 話があるんだ。\n ……父さんのことで。:
Mom, Grandma, I need to talk to you. It's...
it's about Dad.

64005.「そんな……。デイラーさんが\n あの人を殺した 犯人だったなんて……。:
I can't believe... that Mr. Dailer was the one
who killed that man.

64007.「ゴメン。ふたりとも……。\n オレ なんにも知らずに あんなヤツを\n うちに:
I'm sorry. Both of you... I didn't know what I
was doing inviting that guy into our home...

64008.「気にすることないわよ。\n そんなの 私にも わからなかったし……。\n あな:
Don't worry about it. I didn't know that, and
I'm not going to judge you for it.

64009.「あの……<pc>さん。今回は\n 思いがけず うちのゴタゴタに巻き込んじゃって:
Um...<pc>. I'm sorry for the trouble
I've caused you this time by unexpectedly
involving you in our mess.

64010.「せめてもの お詫びに\n 何か お贈りしたいのですが…… 困ったわ。\n いっ:
I'd like to send you something as an apology,
but... I'm stumped. I don't know what in the
world would be appropriate...

64011.「若いの。ちょっと こっちに来な。: Young man. Come here for a minute.

64012.「これからの戦いに 必要じゃろう。\n まもの使いの必殺技を\n お前さんに 伝:
You will need it for the coming battle. I will
teach you the special moves of a Monster
Master.

64013.「まもの使いの必殺技……。それは素晴らしいわ。\n おばあちゃん すみません。\:
The special moves of a Monster Master...
That's brilliant. I'm sorry, Grandma. It's
just that I wasn't there.

64014.「いくよ 若いの。\n しっかり 目をつぶってな。: Here we go, young man. Keep your eyes closed.

64015.メドウは 呪文を唱えはじめた。\n<pc>は 目を閉じ\nメドウの言葉に 耳をか:
Meadow began to chant a spell. <pc>
closed his eyes and listened to Meadow's
words...

64016.「……と思うたが\n お前さんは もう 必殺技を覚えてたか。\n じゃあ これを:
But you've already learned a special move,
haven't you? Then I'll give you this.

64018.「……ひとりで 考えたいことがあるんだ。: I need to think about something alone.

64019.「ハァ……。ムリもないわね。\n 相棒だった キッズが\n 悪者に利用されるかも:
Huh... that doesn't make any sense. I can't
believe that Fry, my partner, might be used by
the bad guys.

64020.「でも <pc>さんのおかげで\n 事前に 魔物商人たちの企みを\n 知ることが:
But thanks to <pc> we were fortunate
to know in advance what the monster merchants
were up to.

64021.「レンドア島壊滅なんて 本当に ゆるせない。\n それだけは 絶対に 阻止しない:
The destruction of Lendor Island is truly
unforgivable. We have to make sure we don't
let that happen.

64022.「……<pc>さん。\n あなたに頼ってばかりで 申し訳ありませんが\n その時:
...<pc>. I'm sorry that I keep
relying on you, but if that's the case, please
lend me your help.

64023.「ですが 相手も レンドア島の壊滅を企むような\n 強敵です。ウデをみがき 時が:
However, they are also a formidable foe, plotting the destruction of Lendor Island. Please improve your skills and lend me your
help again when the time comes.
